price: ߊ߬ ߣߴߊ߬ ߦߋ߫ ߖߊ߬ߛߙߋ߬ߡߊ߬ߟߊ ߞߍ߫ ߡߐ߱ ߟߎ߬ ߦߋ߫ ߡߍ߲ ߠߎ߬ ߞߊ߲߫ ߞߏ߫ ߘߋ߲߫ ߦߋ߫ ߊߟߊ߫ ߓߟߏ߫
arabic: وَيُنذِرَ ٱلَّذِينَ قَالُواْ ٱتَّخَذَ ٱللَّهُ وَلَدٗا

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: wayundhira alladhīna qālū ittakhadha al-lahu waladan
